subject: Order #SSN2777 - Plus X Throttle feels slow and does not return to 0
description_text:
Hello,

The throttle in my set of pedals feels slow to respond when you remove
pressure. It also shows as only returning to 11-14%.

I have added a dead zone of 5/6 but the pedal still shows as 6% pressed
with no pressure.

I have tried the weaker spring but the pedal still feels slow to return to
position and does not return to 0 even with dead zone.

I can return the pedal to 0 if I pull the pedal back with my hand.

This does not seem correct to me and I'd welcome your help in resolving
this issue.

Thank you,
Andrew

conversations.body_text: Hi Andrew,  Please provide your order number. Next, adjust the black preload nut on the throttle spring to apply sufficient tension so that the pedal can return smoothly to its neutral position. After that, reconnect the USB cable of the pedals, click “Offset” in the software interface to reset the initial signal of the pedal, and then perform a new calibration test.
